by on
The Method of Extension and Intension
Chapter I of Meaning and Necessity by Rudolf Carnap

section.title: Introduction
section.abstract: This is my introduction and overall assessment (not a summary of Carnap's).

subsec.title: Purposes
subsec.p: The purposes of thie chapter seem to be to describe a method of "semantic analysis" which is suitble for:
